forum.content: I've been single all my life, but I have talked to numerous friends with their relationship problems and was able to help the situation sometime. You don't have to have experience to see an unhealthy relationship 🤷🏻‍♂️ It's also hard to sort out a strong feeling towards someone, so eventually it's up to the person to decide what he/she wanna do with their love life. I however would straight up tell the person to break up if he/she keeps coming back every time with the same damn problem 😂
